meanings.definition: Excessive darkening of an area of skin due to increased melanin production.
meanings.sent1: The hyperpigmentations on her face were caused by too much sun exposure.
meanings.sent2: The dermatologist diagnosed her condition as hyperpigmentations on her cheeks.
meanings.sent3: Despite using sunscreen, her hyperpigmentations seemed to enjoy the spotlight.
meanings.sent4: The hyperpigmentations on her skin were like dark clouds overshadowing her beauty.
meanings.sent5: The hyperpigmentations stood out like bold strokes on a canvas of skin.

meanings.definition: The presence of abnormally high levels of pigmentation in a certain area of the skin.
meanings.sent1: She was self-conscious about the hyperpigmentations on her arms.
meanings.sent2: The hyperpigmentations on his neck were a result of a genetic condition.
meanings.sent3: The hyperpigmentations on her face made her look like a walking rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The hyperpigmentations were a colorful map on her otherwise pale skin.
meanings.sent5: The hyperpigmentations were like tiny paint splatters on a white canvas.
